H0.text: Gram is the unit of measurement used to describe the mass of an apple.

H1.text: Liter is the unit of measurement used to describe the mass of an apple.

H2.text: Minute is the unit of measurement that should be used to describe the mass of an apple.

H3.text: Meter is the unit of measurement that should be used to describe the mass of an apple.

A4.text: The gram is the most widely used unit of measurement for non-liquid ingredients in cooking and grocery shopping worldwide.

A5.text: Liquid ingredients are often measured by volume rather than mass.
